ing: 3 slices whole wheat bread, each cut into 25 cubes
des: "Who doesn't like croutons on their salad? Some croutons can lead up to 100 extra calories! These croutons are tasty and have great nutritional content. Plus the whole wheat bread is a bonus on fiber! No need for oil on these!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Spread bread cubes onto a baking sheet. Sprinkle salt, paprika, garlic powder, oregano, and black pepper over the cubes.
Bake in preheated oven for 3 minutes, turn, and continue cooking until slightly crisp, about 3 minutes more.
